articles.title: Man Pleads Guilty to COVID-19 Relief Fraud Scheme - Department of Justice
articles.description: A Washington man pleaded guilty today to perpetrating a scheme to fraudulently obtain COVID-19 relief guaranteed by the Small Business Administration (SBA) through the Economic Injury Disaster Loan (EIDL) and the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) under the Co…
